text: 6000 năm lịch sử loài người được hình dung
Dòng thời gian của loài người

alternative: first king of southern kingdom of Juda
For 3 years Jeoahaz and Jeoash reigned together
reign only recorded 6 months, probably only established 792 BCE

text: Israel in the wilderness 1513 to 1473 B.C.E. – 40 years
479 years until the temple construction – 1 Các vua 6:1
3.5 years of Jesus service, executed Nisan 14th, 33 C.E.
7 times – 2520 years to the Messianic Kingdom 1914 C.E. (Đa-ni-ên 4:23)
First Missionary Journey of Paul, c. 47-48 C.E. with Barnabas and John Mark
Circumcision issue at Antioch, conference in Jerusalem c. 49 C.E.
Second Missionary Journey c. 49-52 C.E with Silas (Silvanus)
Paul in custody in Caesarea c. 56-58 C.E.
Paul’s first imprisonment in Rome c. 59-61 C.E.
Paul’s second imprisonment in Rome c. 65 CE, 2 Timothy written, Paul executed
Galba, Otho và Vitellius (Year of the Four Emperors)
Xuất Ai Cập from Egypt on Nisan 14th, 1513 B.C.E.
End of the time of the nations, Gods kingdom starts to rule in heaven 1914 C.E.
Destruction of Jerusalem 607 B.C.E. by Babylon
Destruction of Jerusalem 70 C.E. by Rome under Titus
Destruction of Samaria 740 B.C.E. by Assyria
